component.name: Scrollbar Thumb
component.description: A custom scrollbar thumb component that provides visual indication of scroll position and enables scroll navigation. Features customizable styling, smooth tracking, and responsive behavior for enhanced scrolling experience and visual feedback.

variants.name: Minimal Modern
variants.description: A sleek scrollbar thumb implementation featuring modern styling, smooth animations, clear visibility indicators, and intuitive hover states. Provides precise scroll position feedback while maintaining minimal visual intrusion on content with excellent responsive behavior.

variants.description: Scrollbar Thumb implementation in Gradient Effects style
